name: PM_max
description: Highest Powermode in Auto power mode

name: PM_min
description: Lowest Powermode in Auto power mode

name: Mthr_2to1
description: Mod. index threshold value for PM2=>PM1 change.

name: Mthr_2to3
description: Mod. index threshold value for PM2=>PM3 change.

name: Mthr_3to2
description: Mod. index threshold value for PM3=>PM2 change.

name: pps_short_precharge
description: High to shorten PPS Vcfly precharge time (for test/debug)

name: cmrr_trim_ext
description: High to use reg bank CMRR trim settings

name: dpwm_Nhigh
description: Number of high clock cycles in PWM cycle

name: useDPWM
description: High to use dpwm, low to use internel test pwm

name: modMode
description: Modulation mode (0 peak-mode, single-edge 1:un-latched dual egde  2:latched dual-edge )

name: PMprofile
description: PM profile select. Valid presets: 0-1-2-3-4. 5=> custom profile.

name: audio_proc_enable
description: Enable Audio proc, bypass if not enabled

name: bg_itrim_ext
description: High to use reg bank trim setting.

name: bg_itrim_reg
description: Reg bank LN BG itrim setting

name: hvb_uvp_trim_ext
description: High to use reg. bank hvb UVP setting.

name: PMcfg_BTL_A.lf_gain_ol
description: BTL PM cfg A loop gain setting. 0=low, 1=high

name: ctrim_ext
description: High to force ctrim_reg to drive system ctrim bus

name: ftrim_reg
description: Register bank 100MHz VCO trim setting (for debug.)

name: pwr_en
description: Manual power stage enable, if applicable.

name: use_smart_unmute
description: Use smart unmute if 1, controlled by external pin nmute

name: Mthr_1to2
description: Mod. index threshold value for PM1=>PM2 change.

name: oc_use_lvl2
description: When high: Use OC level 0 low signals as OC level 2 protection signals

name: pll_div_ext
description: High to use register PLL divider settings

name: ctrim
description: Ctrim vector - Routed to all Ctrim on chip (LF, OSC, VCO)

name: pll_div_fb_reg
description: Register bank PLL FB div setting

name: debug_sub
description: Debug analog mode : 3 bit sub function.  Digital mode debug_out0 (x1_clip) mux select

name: debug_add
description: Debug analog mode : 3 bit block address. Digital mode debug_out1 (x2_err) mux select

name: debug_gpo
description: General porpuse outputs from dig core

name: fb_write
description: High to start fuse bank write

name: fb_read
description: High to start fuse bank read

name: fb_reg_ctrl
description: Register take-over bit for fuse bank (1=reg bank controls)

name: ftrim_ext
description: High to force resiter ftrim vector to system ftrim (100MHz VCO trim) bus

name: pll_div_ref_reg
description: Register bank PLL ref div setting

name: oc_blnk_reg
description: OCP blanking delay from register bank

name: bg_vtrim_ext
description: High to use reg bank setting

name: itrim_ext
description: High to use reg bank setting

name: ldo_vtrim_ext
description: High to use reg bank setting

name: inp_afir_test_en
description: Enable inp afir prbs gerator and checker

name: oc_thr_ext
description: High to use reg bank setting

name: oc_blnk_ext
description: High to use reg bank setting

name: mode_calib
description: High to let calib block control ctrim and ftrim (for automatic trimming)

name: ilm_invalid_delay
description: Parameter for OC level 0 balancing scheme. Sets the delay in 40ns steps from powerstage transitions to the OC signal becomes invalid.

name: sw_en_force
description: High to force switchContorllers to drive switches

name: ilm_valid_delay
description: Parameter for OC level 0 balancing scheme. Sets the delay in 40ns steps from powerstage transitions to the OC signal becomes valid.

name: pll_enbits_reg
description: PLL sub-block enable bits for debugging

name: pll_enbits_ext
description: High to use register bits for PLL sub-block enable (debug)

name: limitD
description: -- High to force PWM transitions in every cycle, low to allow D=0 and 1

name: startup_stepThr
description: Number of clk_quart ticks (/256) to advance in startup D limiting sequence

name: eh_triggerShdn
description: Allow EH trigger to shutdown power stages?

name: eh_otpShdn
description: High to enable overtemperature protection shutdown on OTE.

name: error_acc
description: Accumulated errors, at and after triggering

name: error_trig_oc
description: oc flags, if causing error triggering

name: error_trig_vc
description: vcfly flags, if causing error triggering

name: ocp_lvl1_reaction
description: High-level OCP-lvl1 reaction other than lvl-2 promotion

name: gd_disable
description: Individual HS driver disables for debug

name: ocp_latch_en
description: High to use permanently latching level-2 OCP

name: ocp_latch_clear
description: Low-high clears current OCP latched condition.

name: dp_cont
description: High to force continuous drivePulser signaling

name: pwm_gain_reg
description: PWM gen v2 gain control vector

name: pwm_gain_ext
description: High to use register value of pwm_gain

name: mode_itrim
description: enable debug output0 equal 10x trimmed ibias output

name: i2s_format
description: i2s basic data format, 000 = std. i2s, 001 = left justified (default)

name: i2s_sck_pol
description: i2s sck polarity cfg. 0 = rising edge data change

name: i2s_order
description: i2s word bit order. 0 = MSB first

name: i2s_rightfirst
description: i2s L/R word order; 0 = left first

name: pps_disable
description: High to disable PPS system in ASIC mode

name: dbsw_en
description: High to enable serial debug writer

name: enableCMctrl
description: High to enable BTL-mode CM control system

name: sdm_debug_en
description: Take sdm data from i2s data input pins

name: dac_mode_rz
description: High to use RZ SDM output encoding

name: clkDiv_sw_cp
description: Audio source mux CP clk freq setting. Zero setting gives pwm tracking mode

name: hvb_uvp_dis
description: High to disable gate driver supply ("hvboot) UVP

name: pps_retrigger
description: High to allow PPS to re-trigger after protection events

name: audio_in_mode_ext
description: If set, audio_in_mode is controlled from audio_in_mode register. If not set  audio_in_mode is set from fuse bank setting

name: error
description: Current error flag monitor reg - for app. ctrl.

name: PMcfg_BTL_A.freqDiv
description: BTL PM cfg A PWM freq setting. 0=1/1, 1=1/2, 2=1/4

name: PMcfg_BTL_A.modType
description: BTL PM cfg A modulation type.

name: dp_safe
description: High to enable DP safe mode (extra pulses)

name: dt_min_ext
description: High to use reg. bank min. DT setting.

name: gd_pd_strong_reg
description: High to for strong PD in gate driver. ORed with fuse setting.

name: ilm_offCountThr_ext
description: High to use reg bank setting

name: ilm_measDelayCountThr_reg
description: Iout pol. meas. alg. delay cycles

name: ilm_measDelayCountThr_ext
description: High to use reg. bank setting

name: prot_btl_highz_reg
description: High to use high-Z prot. response for BTL

name: use_int_dac_clk_reg
description: High to use internal clocks for DAC. ORed with fuse setting

name: gd_pu_seq_dis
description: High to disable GD PU sequencer

name: sif_mode_i2c_ext
description: High to take setting from register bank, low to take setting from fuse bank.

name: sif_mode_i2c_reg
description: Select serial interface mode. High for I2C, low for SPI.

name: vcf_prot_dis
description: 0: use prot. 1: disable vcf prot in DCUs

name: pmc_fast
description: 0 for normal PMC, 1 for very fast auto-PMC

name: lf_bias_scale_ext
description: High to use reg. bank LF bias scale setting

name: sdm_sck_sel_ext
description: High to use reg SDM sck setting

name: sdm_sck_sel_reg
description: Reg bank SDM sck mux setting

name: hvb_cp_period
description: Power supply charge pump frequency control. The cycle frequency becomes 3*hvb_cp_period in vco clk cycles. Setting 0 gives a frequency of 4/3 of the pwm base frequency.

name: sync_dcus
description: High to synchronize dcu0 and dcu1 pwm phases. When low the two dcus are free-running. In spread spectrum mode (set by freqMode) the dcus are always free-running.

name: inp_afir_test_ctrl
description: Control afir bist. "00" > disable, "01" => JKJ mode.

name: lf_clamp_en
description: High (default) to enable LF int2+3 clamping on clip

name: dc_prot_debug_mode
description: When high: Use ultra fast timeout in DC protection monitor

name: crg_bypass
description: Loop filter clip recovery gater bypass

name: oc_deglitch_dis
description: When high: Do not deglitch OC trig signals.

name: lf_disable_dac
description: High to disable loopfilter unmute dac

name: ilm_valid_delay_ext
description: When high take OC level 0 parameter settings from register, else use fuse setting.

name: vcf_prechg_force
description: High to force Vcf precharge (for debug)

name: fet_testMode_reg
description: High to enter FET testMode (static FET cfg)

name: gd_goi_test_en
description: High to for extra-high vdd_float in gate drivers for GOI test.

name: dc_offset_0l_reg
description: Signed DC offset for channel 0L (BTL configuration)

name: dc_offset_0r_reg
description: Signed DC offset for channel 0R (BTL configuration)

name: dc_offset_1l_reg
description: Signed DC offset for channel 1L (SE configuration)

name: dc_offset_1r_reg
description: Signed DC offset for channel 1R (SE configuration)

name: dc_offset_ext
description: Use register DC offsets instead of fused

name: dc_offset_1sh_reg
description: Multiplier of SE DC offset values (1L and 1R); 3: 4x, 2: 2x, 1: 1x, 0: x/2
